description.brief: A collection of world, model, and launch files.

package.description:
This package is a collection of world, model, and launch files used to launch various gazebo worlds.
The world descriptions are stored in *.world.xacro format, and they should be edited directly. The xacro package is used to load the descriptions into the parameter server.
package.author: Kevin LeBlanc (kevin.canadian@gmail.com)
